CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.1.2.2b, patientonsetageunit (3N)
E2B (R3): D.2.2bAge at Time of Onset of Reaction / Event (unit) Conformance: Optional, but required if D.2.2a is populated. Data Type: 50AN OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.989.2.1.1.26 Value Allowed: UCUM codes for Year, Month, Week, Day, and Hour: {Decade}
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When providing the age in decades,please note that, for example, the 7th decade refers to a person in their 60â€™s
CustomField.label: Patient Age Unit
